title: What are the technologies used in automation testing? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are using Selenium then mostly one of the below languages JavaC#PythonPHPRubyThese are the most popular ones. If you are using QTP/UFT then VBScript and for LeanFT then Java or C# again. If using TestComplete then VBScript, JScript, Python, DelphiScript, C++Script, C#Script If using SoapUI (WebServices testing) then some bit of Java for customisation There for Continuous Integration there would be Jenkins/Bamboo/CircleCI or something Then SQL with MySQL Developer/TOAD If MongoDB testing is involved So there if you see the technologies depends one below What is being testedHow it is testedHow is testing assets organised and put together (HP QC/ALM, TestLink etc...)And this is not a complete list.
